column4: you  can always just go get it from the web site and install it manually. that's what I did
you don't need anything additional to run FF 1.5, just unpack the tgz and you're all set. it feels snappier to me, and i like the drag/relocate tab feature.
what about configuring the dumb sound... i gotta remap the 5.1 outputs :/
configure sound? remap 5.1 output?   I thought you were just talking about running Firefox 1.5?  You don't need to do anything with your sound for that
